memberdef.argsstring: (CMat &Mat, const char &Move, CPosition &Pos, const CMyParamV2 &Param, CPosition &Tp1, CPosition &Tp2)
memberdef.name: MoveToken

briefdescription.para: Move the current token according to the character in the 2nd parameter.

parameterdescription.para: the matrix before and after the move
the key pressed by the user
the player's position before and after the move
position of the first Teleporter in Mat
position of the second Teleporter in Mat

memberdef.argsstring: (const CMat &Mat, const char &Move, const CPosition &Pos, const CMyParamV2 &Param)
memberdef.name: IsMoveLegal

briefdescription.para: Test if the Move made by the player is legal, this mean if there is no wall and no out of bound.

parameterdescription.para: the key pressed by the user

simplesect.para: true if the Move can be made

memberdef.argsstring: (const CMat &Mat, const char &Move, const CPosition &Pos, const CMyParamV2 &Param, CPosition &Tp1, CPosition &Tp2)
memberdef.name: nextMove

briefdescription.para: returns the contents of the next cell and its position in the matrix (even with teleporter)

parameterdescription.para: the key pressed by the user

simplesect.para: <content of the cell <pos x, pos y>>

memberdef.argsstring: (const CMat &Mat, const char &Move, const CPosition &Pos, const CMyParamV2 &Param)
memberdef.name: IsCollectible

briefdescription.para: Test whether the content of the next move's cell is an element.

parameterdescription.para: the key pressed by the user

simplesect.para: true if the next move's cell is an element

briefdescription.para: Increments the score for each item in the list.

parameterdescription.para: list of items the player has collected
